Application.featuresString: DISCOVER_SCHEMA, PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, DIRECT_PERMISSIONS, SEARCH, ENABLE, UNLOCK
Application.name: Microsoft Power BI

entry.value: SELECT EMP_ID, EMAIL_ADDRESS, USER_NAME, ACCESS_TYPE, MASTER_DELETE_FLAG, COMPANY_NO, REST_NUMBER, CHAIN_NUMBER, AREA_NUMBER, DELETE_FLAG, ENTRY_FLAG, PETTY_CASH_ENTRY, SALES_FLAG, PL_FLAG, Marketing_Flag, PAYROLL_FLAG, ARCHIVING_FLAG, USER_TITLE, USER_ID, COST_CENTER, USER_STATUS, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales') END AS SALES_GROUP, CASE WHEN PL_FLAG = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : PL') END AS PL_GROUP, CASE WHEN Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Marketing') END AS MARKETING_GROUP, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'F' and Marketing_Flag = 'F' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales') END AS STORE_INFO_S, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'F' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'F' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : P/L') END AS STORE_INFO_L, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'F' and PL_FLAG = 'F' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_M, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'F' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : P/L,Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_LM, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'F' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales,Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_SM, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'F' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales,P/L') END AS STORE_INFO_SL, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales,P/L,Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_SLM FROM USERDB.User_Security s INNER JOIN USERDB.DimRestaurant r ON s.COMPANY_NO = r.COMPANY_ID and s.REST_NUMBER = r.[Restaurant Code] WHERE s.EMAIL_ADDRESS IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.EMAIL_ADDRESS;

SELECT EMP_ID, EMAIL_ADDRESS, USER_NAME, ACCESS_TYPE, MASTER_DELETE_FLAG, COMPANY_NO, REST_NUMBER, CHAIN_NUMBER, AREA_NUMBER, DELETE_FLAG, ENTRY_FLAG, PETTY_CASH_ENTRY, SALES_FLAG, PL_FLAG, Marketing_Flag, PAYROLL_FLAG, ARCHIVING_FLAG, USER_TITLE, USER_ID, COST_CENTER, USER_STATUS, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales') END AS SALES_GROUP, CASE WHEN PL_FLAG = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : PL') END AS PL_GROUP, CASE WHEN Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Marketing') END AS MARKETING_GROUP, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'F' and Marketing_Flag = 'F' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales') END AS STORE_INFO_S, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'F' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'F' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : P/L') END AS STORE_INFO_L, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'F' and PL_FLAG = 'F' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_M, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'F' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : P/L,Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_LM, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'F' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales,Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_SM, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'F' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales,P/L') END AS STORE_INFO_SL, CASE WHEN SALES_FLAG = 'T' and PL_FLAG = 'T' and Marketing_Flag = 'T' THEN concat(r.COUNTRY_DESC,' : ',r.CHAIN_NAME,' : ',r.[Restaurant Name],' : Sales,P/L,Marketing') END AS STORE_INFO_SLM FROM USERDB.User_Security s INNER JOIN USERDB.DimRestaurant r ON s.COMPANY_NO = r.COMPANY_ID and s.REST_NUMBER = r.[Restaurant Code] and EMAIL_ADDRESS='$(identity)';
Create, Modify, Delete, Enable, Disable, Unlock

Form.name: Form_PowerBI_Account_ProvisioningPolicy
Form.Description: Create Provisioning Policy for Account in Power BI
